entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generation of references will generate several changes #67784
  • [Android] System.Text.Json MissingMethodException #67782
  • Json.net can't deserialize simple struct, throws System.NullReferenceException #67781
  • Consider hand-written JIT helpers for more platforms or use portable version everywhere #67776
  • Allow developers to use built-in meters for tracking stats on caches #67770
    7.0.0
  • Add extension method to help set DI injectable `MemoryCache` with enabled statistics tracking ability #67769
    7.0.0
  • Rolling build CI failure: System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskContinueWithTests.LongContinuationChain_Await_DoesNotStackOverflow #67768
  • Results of the Feb 2022 repo survey for dotnet/runtime #67766
  • Build of coreclr fails with musl 1.2.3 #67763
  • Enabling SIMD for System.Numerics.Vector4 causes an assertion in mini-llvm.c:5817 #67762
    7.0.0
  • JSON flaky tests #67761
  • createdump / signals do not work with macOS application that has LSUIElement=true #67760
    7.0.0
  • [Mono Linux arm64 Release] JIT/Methodical/tailcall/compat_i4_u_il_r and compat_i4_u_il_d fail in merged wrapper mode #67756
    7.0.0
  • Occasional "Keyset does not exist" exception when calling .GetRSAPrivateKey on Windows #67752
  • [API Proposal]: Default `IEnumerator<T>` implementation for `object IEnumerator.Current { get; }` #67751
  • Runtime type loader support for static abstract interface methods #67745
    7.0.0
  • Determine recommended behavior of checked/unchecked operators for DateTime and similar types #67744
    7.0.0
  • Expand CoreCLR testing #67743
    7.0.0
  • Publish NativeAOT compiler with NativeAOT #67742
    7.0.0
  • Expand libraries testing #67741
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json options throws an exception setting DefaultIgnoreCondition = Always #67740
  • JIT might emit unnecessary null check when enumerating arrays of KVP #67739
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow IReadOnlyDictionary GetValueOrDefault parameter key to be nulllable #67738
  • [Mono] aot build error when a delegate return struct by reference #67734
  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.StreamReaderWithBufferedStream_Tests.ReadToEndAsync_WithCancellation #67730
  • runtime-extra-platforms rolling build failure: Docker Internal Server Error - The container operating system does not match the host operating system. #67728

Closed

  • [wasm] ILLinker update broke wasm builds #67538
  • CrossDac build is failing in internal build #67632
    7.0.0
  • Debug.Assert(false) on Mono produces `Process terminated due to " ` #66971
  • Let consumers of MemoryCache access metrics #50406
    7.0.0
  • Test failed at double initialization assert in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.JsonTypeInfo.InitializePropCache() #60962
    7.0.0
  • ConstructorConverter argument cache initialization invoking the wrong method #67333
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Peer closing connection can result in OperationCanceledException on pending write #58078
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] ReservedFrameType_Throws test fails #53090
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • S.S.C.Cose: Add Async Stream-based signatures #67786
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix a JIT formatting issue #67785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update C# compiler and revert workaround #67780
    area-Build-mono
  • Add CoverageIncludeTests mention to coverage.md #67779
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adding class target to RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute #67778
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support default timeouts in RegexGenerator #67775
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Remove COM from profiler messages #67774
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • fix build for musl 1.2.3 #67772
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding missing SDK assets for Publish #67765
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add timeout parameter to perf-job to allow passing to template #67764
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67759
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Vectorize IndexOf for OrdinalIgnoreCase #67758
    area-System.Globalization
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Bundle net472 dependencies for MonoAOTCompiler task #67757
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.x
  • Fix exception thrown when MsQuicStream write direction is locally aborted #67753
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm][debugger] Debugger Proxy: add property accessibility info. #67748
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Mark only first indirection of block copies as faulting #67747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67746
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use "..."u8 in dotnet/runtime #67733
    area-Meta
  • Rewrite RegexPrefixAnalyzer.FindFirstCharClass #67732
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Update host tracing doc to match the current functionality #67749
    documentation, area-Host
  • Remove dbgshim and related code #67725
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, tenet-performance, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Use properties for target versions for core and framework #67717
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • display tidy message for failed assertions on mono #67750
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix cross dac packaging #67710
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Cache several char[] allocations in System.Private.Xml library methods #67001
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Replace 2 allocations from string.ToCharArray() with ReadOnlySpan in System.Private.Xml library #67002
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add NoWASM to category filter #67721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add JitDump output for calls to recordRelocation #67639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Further JsonPropertyInfo caching cleanup #67754
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Allow getting code coverage for the unit test project itself #67736
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix exception thrown from MsQuicStream writes when connection is aborted by peer. #67651
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bundle net472 dependencies for MonoAOTCompiler task #67719
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Updated

  • Always run CopyAllNativeProjectReferenceBinaries #67718
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • FabricBot config: Viktor is back #67787
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Oracle RIDs #66684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [runtime] copy updated byref nullables after invoke #67652
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Code fix to add DisableRuntimeMarshalling when required #67676
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Re-adding some tests that were commented out now that IgnoreCase work is done #67709
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][llvm] Refactor code to make it easier to support LLVM 13.x in … #67692
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Change SuperPMI asm diffs relocation handling #67688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ReplenishingRateLimiter and IdleDuration #67020
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Added test for extracting zip files with invalid characters in Windows #67332
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Added the `hard_limit_exceeded_p` back as without it, we won't be retrying another heap to fit the new allocation. #67724
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fixed error messages on collections indexing #67696
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [Mono]Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #67125
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Perf: Fixes for blazor_scenarios #67414
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Cleanup unused code and remove sparc and mips architectures #67503
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [WIP] Faster vsd hashtables #67609
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Add/use CustomTypeMarshaller implementations for string marshalling #67635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • [release/6.0] Add libssl3 dependency to Debian DEPS package #67705
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.x
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix hanging of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix wrong constant folding for bswap16 #67726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 8] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting` #67511
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #67419
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67145
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.5
  • Improve List performance in IEnumerable.SequenceEqual #67722
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    needs-author-action

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] added a null check #1884
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Emsdk update to 3.1.8 #1885

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish --no-build on ubuntu fails with error: Manifest file at '/someFolder/staticwebassets.build.json' not found. #24772
  • Testhost runtimeconfig is rewritten #24769
  • IncludeAllContentForSelfExtract and pre-publish tasks #24763
  • [Loc]With .NET 7 Preview 3 SDK installed on local OS, "Installation Source" is not localized after running "dotnet workload list" #24762
  • Can not install on Ubuntu 22.04 (jammy) due to libssl1.1 dependency #24759
  • [Loc]With .NET 7 Preview 3 SDK zip installed on local OS, some garbled characters appear when installing wasm-tools for the first time #24757

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't retarget testhost #24770
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24760

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24751
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24755
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • dotnet sln: Add error message for misplaced solution argument #18608
    Area-CLI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1707356 #24673
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lambda using 'sbyte' as parameter name overflows the parsing stack #60661
  • [Infra] Trigger insertion validation more easily directly from github PR #60660
  • AnalyzerConfigFiles should be deduped, or else they cancel themselves out #60656
  • Add option for diagnostics (squiggles/error list/etc.) to only check *visible* (not just *open*) files. #60652
  • Need to make CodeLens tagger not tag files that are not visible. #60651
  • RequestExecutionQueue fails to dispose of a linked CancellationTokenSource #60649
  • Roslyn can't load an analyzer with a filename that does not match its assembly name #60646
  • Incorrect 'The variable 'X' is assigned but its value is never used' when constant is used in attribute of local function #60645
    Compiler.Next
  • "..."u8 prefers byte[] when it should prefer ReadOnlySpan<byte> #60644
    17.3
  • ""u8 should use singleton byte array #60643
    17.3
  • Remove LangVer check for `nameof(parameter)` feature before shipping #60640
    C# 11.0

Closed

  • Suppress with attribute adds a blank line between members with xml doc comments #47427
    Backlog
  • Double bang shows unexpected error when added to last argument of constructor #60615

PullRequests

Created

  • use dotnet to build roslyn by default #60659
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove duplicate package references #60658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Re-enable Code Definition Window integration tests #60657
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid formatting diagnostics with raw strings #60655
    Area-Compilers
  • Delay starting the work to scan for todo-items #60654
    Area-IDE
  • Run continuation to dispose of cancellation token source #60653
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Add parameters in scope in nameof in certain attributes #60642
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Add ServiceHub helpers recommended in previous PR #60604
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixed adding a redundant blank line when suppressing with local attribute #60648
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Remove the TemporaryWorkspace entirely from the RemoteWorkspace code. #60638
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Pull feature-specific APIs out of ISyntaxFacts #60636
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update versions for preview4 #60650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Extend scope of type parameters in attributes #40525
    Area-Compilers, C# 11.0
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60641
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Update Typescript VS interface #60635
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, Community
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60490
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Global indentation options - take 2 #60565
    Area-IDE
  • Async suggestions improvements #60528
    Area-IDE
  • Support declaration and consumption of user-defined Unsigned Right Shift operator. #60616
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Check val escape for initializers of fields with ref-like type #60577
    Area-Compilers
  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE
  • Remove IDynamicFileInfo-added syntax trees to attempt to improve perf #60531
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typo in `#if` directive #60555
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error when using components in if blazor server side #41119
  • Change EndpointMetadataContext/EndpointParameterMetadataContext classes to use constructors to set property values #41117
    7.0-preview4
  • Template 'ASP.NET Core Web App' adds unnecessary usings to Startup.cs #41114
  • Blazor app.razor NotFound not authorizing #41113
  • Hot Reload still not working in VS2022 v17.2 in aspnet core web app #41112
  • When doing hot reload, if it must rebuild, add an option to have it start on the page it was last. #41111
  • After changing some code in Counter.razor, then click "Hot Reload" button, the Counter button on the home page will disappear. #41110
  • Provide a component instance capture in RouteView (aka new RouteView.Instance property) #41106
  • RedisHubLifetimeManager OnDisconnectedAsync Exception #41104
  • dotnet D:/d1/d2/...xx/web1.dll will cause Confusing webroot-path if the command-path is different with web1.dll real path #41103
  • Augment performance scenarios for minimal APIs #41102

Closed

  • SPA Hot Reload #41105
  • Blazor WASM CSS Isolation error #40995
  • There is no file with ID 1. The file list may have changed #41085
  • Unexpected behavior when using Results method as delegate #41082
  • Cache IResult types for well known status codes and results without parameters #39951
    7.0-preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    community-contribution
  • Add ctors to EndpointMetadataContext/EndpointParameterMetadataContext #41116
    area-runtime
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
  • Make Results<TResult1, TResultN> union types implement IEndpointMetadataProvider #41109
    area-runtime
  • fix allocation issue caused by ordering of MVC result executors for Task results #41108
    area-mvc
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Caching common HttpResults types #40965
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
  • Implement minimal RateLimitingMiddleware #41008
    area-runtime
  • Update InputFile error message for stale references #41094
    blocked, area-blazor, 7.0-preview4
  • Adding support for custom JsonConverter(s) when deserializing JSON patches to generic object types #40966
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Enable Latin1 request targets #41098
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-trace topn report can misprint method names #2994
    .NET 7.0

Closed

  • `EventSource` should mention some built-in types require special handling #2608
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Set the build ID using arcade's scripts instead of retrieving it from another job (#2993) #2995
  • Set the build ID using arcade's scripts instead of retrieving it from another job #2993

Updated

  • [Proposal] Add dotnet-trace report stat and report script command #2988
    enhancement, dotnet-trace
  • Rewrite DumpAsync in C# #2964
  • [Infrastructure] Add devcontainer infra to diagnostics repo #2986
    Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot hide tab bar or change flyout display options #5932
  • RadioButton has a weird dark background #5931
  • [mauipalooza] CornerRadius not working on Button #5930
  • [mauipalooza] ImageButton doesn't render gradient brush background #5929
  • [mauipalooza] Border doesn't contain or wrap image #5928
  • Maui Windows unpackaged app fails to start #5927
  • Workload installation failed on macOS / arm64 #5926
  • Change BatteryPowerSource.Usb to BatteryPowerSource.Cable #5925
  • TableView with Picker #5924
  • [Android] App is crashing after closing app via back button on restarting the app #5922
  • [mauipalooza] Android emulator is not added immediately when MAUI project is added to existing solution #5921
  • Create a PickerCell to be used with a TableView #5920
  • [Android]: Prevent Entry from losing focus when touch to another child of the ViewGroup is performed #5916
  • Icon on Alt-Tab not showing on Windows #5915
  • Expose the types/interfaces in Maui Essentials as a separate library targeting net6.0 #5914
  • BlazorWebView API review: WPF #5910
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView API review: WinForms #5909
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView API review: iOS/macCatalyst #5908
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView API review: Android #5907
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView API review: Windows #5906
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView API review: Shared sources #5905
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView API review: Open questions #5904
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Find some way to run font loader tests on older Androids #5903
    6.0.300
  • Add tests for msbuild targets #5902
    6.0.300
  • Deploy to IOS from 17.2 preview 2.1 results in /usr.bin.codesign exited with code 1 #5901
  • Wrong path to Environment.SpecialFolder.LocalApplicationData. #5900
  • [Windows] Adding an Image as child of ScrollView without size properties crashes the application #5898

Closed

  • Dropdown From razor Class Library does not work in Blazor MAUI Windows, but works fine in Blazor Wasm Client #5767
  • The default radio button is not selected on startup #5645
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Blazor Hybrid | Mac Catalyst Publish Failure #5197
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Add better support for unpackaged apps #3166
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Android] Label width doesn't get updated with text #5717
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Android] FontImageSource not applied Color or Size properties #4013
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Match in-tree order of targets with workloads and fix some WinUI issues #5923
    t/bug, p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, fatal, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Update iOS / Mac Catalyst Blazor Hybrid APIs #5919
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/desktop 🖥️
  • [workload] Merge Dependencies and Extensions packs #5918
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917

Merged

  • Add a vscode workspace and some build tasks #5827
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Updating SupportedOSPlatformVersion property in project templates #5866
    area/templates 📄
  • Ensure GroupValueChangedMessage is received #5646
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Blazor] Support unpackaged Win UI apps #5880
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • BlazorWebView public API tracking #5672
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Prevent ScrollView on Android and Windows from entering a bad layout state #5897
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲
  • Update WebAuthenticator sample package versions #4945
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Fix some crashing tests #5261
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Don't do manifest things for unpackaged apps #5896
    t/bug, area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • #4013 fixed fontimagesource color and size loading issue #5876

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Rendering Shapes without explicit bounds. #5817
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix some of the violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Fix AppTitleBarHeight to match caption button heights #5811
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [android] Update to latest AndroidX packages with better Trimmable support. #5889
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Clean-up and fix VisualTreeElementExtensions hit testing #5892
  • [iOS] Implement iOSPlatform Specifics #5879
    platform/iOS 🍎
  • Correctly notify changes in the Page BackgroundColor property #5706
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Add Essentials Maps TryOpen #5834
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Remove iOS Compat ColorExtension ToUIColor overlap #5854
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/migration 🚚

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetProperty should return null if not found; instead it throws an exception #27791
  • Ability to hook into model finalization? #27790
  • EFCore CosmosDB - Seed items with navigation properties #27789

Closed

  • How to add a Postgres concurrency shadow property when using `IMutableEntityType` #27781
  • CosmosDB Point Read not taking into account partition and id #27782
